page.title: 01NORTH HYKEHAM
page.content: The town of North Hykeham is a fast growing suburban town three miles from Lincoln.There are large housing estates and an industrial estate. In 1974 the Parish Council decided to change the village into a town,and this body then became a Town Council and North Hykeham has a Mayor,elected each year.In 1985 we have a Lady Mayor,Mrs.Proctor. A new relief road is being built which should relieve the A46 of the heavy traffic travelling through the centre of the town. North Hykeham has several playing fields,the Witham Fields and the Memorial Field being the largest. There is a large sports centre with all facilities.
